summary.overall_assessment: Solid opportunity for senior data engineer at established Belgian consulting firm with modern tech stack and Data Mesh focus. Strong technical requirements and quality emphasis. Key gaps are compensation transparency, reporting structure clarity, and growth opportunities. Good fit for engineers seeking technical depth over rapid career advancement.
